attributes.action: stop norman bettison getting his pension pay from the people of liverpool
attributes.additional_details: norman bettison is planning taking £88,000 of the tax payers money in liverpool which i belive is totally wrong as he has hurt a lot of people in liverpool with his lies and deceit stop this and make south yorkshire police give him his 88,000 pension and put the money to a better use like youth projects ,nhs and to merseyside people who deserve it not norman bettison
